1: <pb/><e>A jun tic sb'it David yic sc'ochx eb' israel 'a Jerusalén</e> <pb/><t>Til wal sja'l xwab'i yic xyaln eb' 'ayn 'ixtic: Coyc 'a yatut Jehová, xchi eb'.</t>
2: <t>Ax ticnec, 'ayn̈ xo 'ec' 'a yol chon̈b' Jerusalén tic.</t>
3: <t>A Jerusalén wach' yaj sb'o'i, junn̈j chon̈b'al yaji sec a 'a tic 'oj syam sb'a smasnil 'anma'.</t>
4: <t>A 'a jun chon̈b' tic 'oj jawc eb' schon̈b' Jehová, ax wul yalnc eb' swach' paxti 'a 'a, 'icha yutjnac yaln can 'a eb' quit israelalec 'a pecti'.</t>
5: <t>A 'a jun chon̈b' tic 'ay yatutal b'eyc'ojlal, atn 'a tic 'oj b'eyc'ojlwoc eb' yin̈tl rey David 'a stojlal.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Alc 'ixtic: 'Ay cab' junc'ojlal 'a chon̈b' Jerusalén, ax eb' cajn 'a jun chon̈b' tic, may cab' tas tzna eb'.</t>
7: <t>'Ay cab' junc'ojlal 'a yol chon̈ab', may cab' tas tzna eb' soldado 'ayc' 'a scuartel.</t>
8: <t>Yuj eb' wit chon̈ab' yet' eb' in wach'c'ojol, yuj cha, ax waln 'ixtic: 'Ay cab' junc'ojlal 'a jun chon̈b' tic, xin chi.</t>
9: <t>Yuj in chamc'ojlal 'a yatut Jehová qui Diosalec, yuj cha, 'oj wac' 'ip in sayn 'ec' tas tz'aj yochx Jerusalén 'a wach'il.</t>
